channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.description: ‚ÄúThe prospects for the economy and prospects for the stock market do not go hand in hand,‚Äù one economist noted.

item.title: Elon Musk will interview Trump on Monday night, Republican presidential nominee says
item.description: Donald Trump and Sen. JD Vance are facing Vice President Kamala Harris and Gov. Tim Walz in the 2024 presidential election.

item.title: Dow rallies 500 points as Wall Street rebound gains steam: Live updates
item.description: The S&P 500 partially recovered a day after the broad market index notched its worst day in nearly two years as global markets sold off.

item.title: Bond investors are coping with recession anxiety, extreme volatility
item.description: It took only about a week for riskier U.S. corporate bonds with ‚Äòjunk‚Äô credit ratings to erase all of their gains this year.

item.title: Markets are counting on the Fed to head off recession with sizeable interest rate cuts
item.description: How Chair Jerome Powell and his cohorts react likely will go a long way in determining how investors negotiate a turbulent climate.

item.title: U.S. crude oil rises as Wall Street rallies, market braces for expected Iran attack against Israel
item.description: Oil futures rose on Tuesday as Wall Street sought a turnaround from the prior session's sell-off.

item.title: Oil prices end slightly higher as stock market bounces after Monday plunge
item.description: Oil futures rose modestly Tuesday, with support attributed in part to fears a potential retaliatory attack by Iran on Israel could spiral into a threat to crude supply from the Middle East.

item.title: 10-year Treasury yield rebounds after hitting its lowest level in more than a year
item.description: Treasury yields bounced back on Tuesday as investors closely monitored a reversal of the previous day's global market sell-off.

item.title: Where BlackRock's Rick Rieder sees income opportunity amid the market volatility
item.description: Rick Rieder, BlackRock's chief investment officer of global fixed income, said these assets have attractive yields and solid fundamentals.

item.title: Fed rate cuts could prove to be a double-edged sword when it comes to inflation
item.description: A day after U.S. recession fears swept global financial markets, a few things became clear. One of them is that if the Federal Reserve actually delivers as many rate cuts as traders currently expect, it could lead to a new set of problems.

item.title: Microsoft fires back at Delta after massive outage, says airline declined 'repeated' offers for help
item.description: Microsoft said Delta turned down several offers for help during the flight disruptions following the outage.

item.title: Elon Musk's X sues advertisers over alleged 'massive advertiser boycott' after Twitter takeover
item.description: The company formerly known as Twitter filed the lawsuit against the World Federation of Advertisers and member companies Unilever, Mars, CVS Health and Orsted.

item.title: Trump, Harris campaigns race to define Democratic running mate Tim Walz
item.description: The Kamala Harris and Donald Trump presidential campaigns pushed dueling portraits of newly announced Democratic running mate, Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz.

item.title: Markets are counting on the Fed to head off recession with sizeable interest rate cuts
